'''David Lee "Tank" Abbott''' (born April 26, 1965) is an American mixed martial arts fighter and former professional wrestler. Abbott appeared as himself in "[[The One With The Ultimate Fighting Champion]]", defeating [[Pete Becker]], a billionaire who was dating [[Monica Geller|Monica]] at the time. Tank won quite easily in a very short match.
